name: Carrot Odyssey
description:
Carrot Odyssey is a small puzzle game about a space bunny planting space carrots to satisfy the whims of the mysterious carrot monoliths. Levels are generated at random, you can pick from small, medium or large to change the size of the game.

You can play with mouse or keyboard. Click to plant or remove a carrot from a ground tile, or use the arrow keys to move and press space to plant/remove.

You win the game when the entire grid is lit up, and all the monoliths have been satisfied. Each monolith displays the number of carrots it needs planted around it to become satisfied.
